author: Lewis B. Smedes
message: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and realize that prisoner was you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: In separateness lies the world's great misery, in compassion lies the world's true strength.
title: Thought of the day

author: Nikos Kazantzakis
message: By believing passionately in something that does not yet exist, we create it.
title: Thought of the day

message: Letting go is not the end of the world; it is the beginning of a new life.
title: Thought of the day
